mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Tries to detect VirtualPC via vpcext instruction at "0xb073f0f".
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe reads out system information, commonly used to detect "VirtualBox" via registry. (Key is "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\HARDWARE\ACPI\DSDT\VBOX__").
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe tries to detect forensic tool by checking for existence of window name "Registry Monitor - Sysinternals: www.sysinternals.com".
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe enumerates running processes.
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe hides thread via API "NtSetInformationThread".
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe searches for sensitive data of web browser "CocCoc" by file.

(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe tries to detect antivirus software via WMI query: "SELECT * FROM AntiVirusProduct".
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe queries hardware properties via WMI: SELECT * FROM Win32_VideoController.
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe queries the host's domain name.
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe tries to detect antivirus software via WMI query: "SELECT * FROM AntiVirusProduct".
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe takes a screenshot using BitBlt API.
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe is possibly trying to detect a VM via rdtsc.
(Process #1) 2cf020fa3f37bbffd38584ba9a760d46.exe downloads file via http from https://vecturar.top/zsia.
